ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/DecisionLogic
CodeDisplayDefinition
The client has prior history of intussusception"Potential contraindications" = "Prior history of intussusception""Potential contraindications" = "Prior history of intussusception" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.Rotaviruscontraindications * Tabs: Rotavirus
Rotavirus vaccination is contraindicated"Immunization recommendation status" = "Contraindicated""Immunization recommendation status" = "Contraindicated" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.Rotaviruscontraindications * Tabs: Rotavirus
Do not vaccinate client with rotavirus as rotavirus vaccination is contraindicated for clients with prior history of intussusception.Do not vaccinate client with rotavirus as rotavirus vaccination is contraindicated for clients with prior history of intussusception.Do not vaccinate client with rotavirus as rotavirus vaccination is contraindicated for clients with prior history of intussusception. Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.Rotaviruscontraindications * Tabs: Rotavirus
The client has severe immunodeficiency'"Potential contraindications" = "Immunodeficiency syndromes"'"Potential contraindications" = "Immunodeficiency syndromes" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.Rotaviruscontraindications * Tabs: Rotavirus
Do not vaccinate client with rotavirus as rotavirus vaccincation is contraindicated for clients with severe immunodeficiency, including severe combined immunodeficiency.Do not vaccinate client with rotavirus as rotavirus vaccincation is contraindicated for clients with severe immunodeficiency, including severe combined immunodeficiency.Do not vaccinate client with rotavirus as rotavirus vaccincation is contraindicated for clients with severe immunodeficiency, including severe combined immunodeficiency. Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.Rotaviruscontraindications * Tabs: Rotavirus

Rotavirus vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note"Immunization recommendation status" = "Further evaluation needed""Immunization recommendation status" = "Further evaluation needed" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.Rotaviruscontraindications * Tabs: Rotavirus
Do not vaccinate client with rotavirus if client had severe allergic reactions to a previous rotavirus vaccine dose or rotavirus vaccine components.Check if the client has no known severe hypersensitivity to rotavirus vaccines components.Check if the client has no known severe hypersensitivity to rotavirus vaccines components. Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.Rotaviruscontraindications * Tabs: Rotavirus

Do not vaccinate client with rotavirus if client has history of anaphylactic reaction to a previous rotavirus vaccine dose or rotavirus vaccine components.Do not vaccinate client with rotavirus if client has history of anaphylactic reaction to a previous rotavirus vaccine dose or rotavirus vaccine components.Do not vaccinate client with rotavirus if client has history of anaphylactic reaction to a previous rotavirus vaccine dose or rotavirus vaccine components. Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.Rotaviruscontraindications * Tabs: Rotavirus

Clinical judgement is required. Client has altered immunocompetence other than severe combined immunodeficiency, consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement.Client has altered immunocompetence other than severe combined immunodeficiency, consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement.Client has altered immunocompetence other than severe combined immunodeficiency, consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement. title.value: Decision Logic For Decision Table IMMZ.D5.DT.Rotaviruscontraindications

description.value: Value Set for Decision Logic For Decision Table IMMZ.D5.DT.Rotaviruscontraindications. Autogenerated from DAK artifacts

code.value: The client has prior history of intussusception
Rotavirus vaccination is contraindicated
Do not vaccinate client with rotavirus as rotavirus vaccination is contraindicated for clients with prior history of intussusception.
The client has severe immunodeficiency
Do not vaccinate client with rotavirus as rotavirus vaccincation is contraindicated for clients with severe immunodeficiency, including severe combined immunodeficiency.
The client has a history of severe allergic reactions
Rotavirus vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note
Do not vaccinate client with rotavirus if client had severe allergic reactions to a previous rotavirus vaccine dose or rotavirus vaccine components.
The client has history of anaphylactic reactions
Do not vaccinate client with rotavirus if client has history of anaphylactic reaction to a previous rotavirus vaccine dose or rotavirus vaccine components.
The client has altered immunocompetence
Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note
Client has altered immunocompetence other than severe combined immunodeficiency, consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement.
The client has spina bifida
Client has spina bifida, consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement.
The client has bladder exstrophy
Client has bladder exstrophy, consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement.
The client has chronic gastrointestinal disease
Client has chronic gastrointestinal disease, consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement.
The client has acute gastroenteritis
Client has acute gastroenteritis, consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement. Consider delaying rotavirus vaccination.
The client has moderate to severe fever
Client has moderate to severe fever, consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement. Consider delaying rotavirus vaccination.
